description: Sonia Sotomayor is sworn in as an Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States. She is the first Latina and third woman to take oath into the justice courts.
title: Sonia Sotomayor Takes Judicial Oath
title_page: Sonia Sotomayor Takes Judicial Oath - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Sonia Sotomayor is sworn in as an Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States. She is the first Latina and third woman to take oath into the justice courts.
